item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0969; 12:38PM; 3703 S Gramercy Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Pij4Yw; #ExpositionPark; It took 26 firefighters 19 minutes to locate, confine, and extinguish the flames inside of the living space and attic of a single-family home. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC18 E226 E294 E34 E94 RA15 RA26 T26 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0969; 12:19PM; 3703 S Gramercy Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Pij4Yw; #ExpositionPark; One-story single family home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC18 E226 E294 E34 E94 RA15 RA26 T26 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1468; 09:16PM; 3766 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3iM4Bb3; Historic South-Central; Firefighters made a quick stop on the fire, which spread to the vacant commercial structure, which sustained only minor damage to one upper wall (which initially appeared to be on the roof). It took 20 firefighters 45 from the time of the initial transformer fire dispatch to extinguish all fire. No injuries. ; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E14 E15 E215 RA15 SQ21 T15; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1468; 08:41PM; 3766 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3iM4Bb3; Historic South-Central; Initially dispatched as a transformer fire, this incident has been upgraded to a structure fire after flames were seen on the roof of a nearby commercial building.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E14 E15 E215 RA15 SQ21 T15; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0868; 01:40PM; 1106 S Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YatTzT; #PicoUnion; At the scene of a law enforcement operation, reportedly involving a barricaded suspect, firefighters found a one-story bungalow with smoke showing. Police reported the subject was in custody and firefighters engaged in offensive fire attack. It took 28 firefighters just 8 minutes to access and extinguish the small fire inside the bungalow. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC13 E13 E211 E229 E26 E29 RA29 SQ21 T11 T29; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Update KNOCKDOWN Outside Fire; INC#0179; 03:32AM; 725 S Merchant St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FIGiUM; #DowntownLA; It took 70 firefighters 41 minutes to extinguish fire in a large pallet yard. Firefighters will remain on scene to uncover and eliminate remaining hot spots among the debris. No injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E14 E201 E21 E210 E211 E215 E220 E227 E25 E27 E4 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA27 RA809 RA9 T1 T10 T11 T15 T20 T27 UR27 UR88; CH7; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Outside Fire; INC#0179; 02:51AM; 725 S Merchant St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FIGiUM; #DowntownLA; Firefighters are on scene lf a large pallet yard that is on fire. The surrounding structures have not become involved at this time.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E14 E201 E21 E210 E211 E215 E220 E227 E25 E27 E4 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA27 RA809 RA9 T1 T10 T11 T15 T20 T27 UR27 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0098; 01:22AM; 1109 S Santa Fe Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FEbZ1m; #DowntownLA; Firefighters arrived to find a one-story row of commercials (approx 75' x 100') with fire showing. It took 88 firefighters 54 minutes to extinguish the flames inside (2:14am). No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 BC725 CM20 CM22 E14 E201 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E227 E27 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA17 RA27 RA827 SQ21 T1 T10 T2 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Auto vs Pedestrian; INC#1414; 05:50PM; 10900 W Oxnard St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BnXYST; #NorthHollywood; LAFD responded to reports of one vehicle that struck four pedestrians (one adult female, and three children under the age of approximately 8 years old). One 5-year-old male was transported in critical condition. The adult female and other two children (unknown age/gender) were transported in moderate condition. LAPD Inc #3146. Nothing further.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E289 E77 EM11 RA39 RA76 RA78 RA86 RA89 T60 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Auto Rollover; INC#0611; 10:22AM; 100 E Swinford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hegZQW; #SanPedro; A two-vehicle collision (one overturned) resulted in 5 patients being transported to the hospital by LAFD ambulance in mild-to-moderate condition (no life-threatening injuries). No extrication required. LAPD Inc #1414. Nothing further.; FS 112; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E112 E248 E36 E40 EM13 HR3 RA101 RA112 RA36 RA79 RA848 T48; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange
